name: Github Issue Finder
description: This extension will Find Issue similar to required issues
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; default-src 'self' data: gap: https://ssl.gstatic.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' default-src 'self' data: gap: https://fonts.gstatic.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' default-src 'self' data: gap: https://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'
